property.name: MaxDopForSecondary
property.type: System.Nullable`1[[System.Int32, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib

object.script:
/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Server Version : SQL Server v160 ($(ServerVersion)) Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure Arc SQL Managed Instance Edition Source Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2008 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)', FILENAME = N'$(PrimaryFilePath)/$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName).mdf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)_log', FILENAME = N'$(PrimaryFilePath)/$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)_log.ldf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ARITHABORT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ENABLE_BROKER ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET RECOVERY FULL ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET MULTI_USER ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET DB_CHAINING OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET READ_WRITE

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Server Version : SQL Server v160 ($(ServerVersion)) Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure Arc SQL Managed Instance Edition Source Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2012 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE name = N'$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)') BEGIN CREATE DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] CONTAINMENT = NONE ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)', FILENAME = N'$(PrimaryFilePath)/$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName).mdf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)_log', FILENAME = N'$(PrimaryFilePath)/$(SingleQuoteEscapedDatabaseName)_log.ldf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS END
IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ARITHABORT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ENABLE_BROKER ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET RECOVERY FULL ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET MULTI_USER ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET DB_CHAINING OFF ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 60 SECONDS ALTER DATABASE [$(BracketEscapedDatabaseName)] SET READ_WRITE
